text: Shredder is the main antagonist of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles franchise and the turtles' archenemy. ==Portrayals== Shredder has been played by Brian Tee in movies based on TMNT. ==References== Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1984 Category:Fictional demons and devils Category:Fictional Japanese people Category:Fictional mass murderers Category:Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles characters
title: Shredder (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles)
